summary: Leading companies want their business processes to be as cutting edge as the tech they use to develop innovative products. To ensure they quickly respond to users' needs, they: Manage products through recurring processes, such as updating portfolios (sets of related products) to respond to user needs at least every 6 months Continually update a product's business plan as they gain knowledge from user feedback...
title: Leading Practices: Agile Portfolio Management and Iterative Business Cases Drive Innovative Product Development
